properties.note: Mobotix M16 camera. May be optioned with LPR sensors, however this camera is likely mounted too high to be used as a ALPR. Possibly used to monitor traffic count or road temperature/conditions.
Located in West Haven but their police department does not use Rekor
possibly located in Bethany, unsure of accuracy of town border
Generic bullet camera pointed at outgoing traffic. Not Rekor or Axis.
